name: D.U Super Mario Bros.: Anniversary Edition
overview: AE was created by the good folks of www.darkumbra.net. This game was originally intended to be released at the one-year anniversary of DarkUmbra, the website. Help Mario save the princess one last time. With original levels & textures, you'll be sure to find yourself emerged into this new Mario universe. Travel through various side-scrolling worlds by yourself, or with friends. DUSMB: AE offers a wide variety of fun for players of all ages. Help friends by carrying them over a hole, or by launching them directly into danger.
